name: Underground Facility
description:
Made for the #MyFirstGameJam, but I have plans on continuing the development. This is a game made to test the enemies movement with physics, the main mechanics of the game and to give a feel of how the complete game will be (at least, the feel of an almost horror action game).

Recommended specs:

  • GPU: Nvidia GeForce GT 630
  • CPU: Intel Core i3 - 6100  - 3.70 GHz 
  • RAM: 4,00 GB
